title: rear_farm_gate_closed_for_animal_control
summary: Rear farm gate closed as part of daily routine to control animal access.
description: This data unit documents the rear gate of MaMeeFarm being closed as a daily routine. The action is performed to prevent external animals from entering the farm area located behind the residence.

environment_context.area_description: rear zone of the property designated as farm area

external_reference.note: Rear gate secured as part of daily farm management.
